dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 3002 IH: Rebuilding Rural Roads Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Finstad (for himself and Mr. Stauber) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To amend title 23, United States Code, to reduce the population definition of rural area to 20,000 to restrict eligibility to be considered under the rural surface transportation grant program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Rebuilding Rural Roads Act.

section.header: Definition of rural area under rural surface transportation grant program
section.text: Section 173(a)(2) of title 23, United States Code, is amended by striking 200,000 and inserting 20,000.
